item.title: AWS Toolkit Extension for VSCode
item.description: Overview This website uses custom APIs hosted in AWS, built using API Gateway and backend Lambda Functions. To reduce the time taken for development and testing, I recently started using the AWS Toolkit extension for Visual Studio Code, which allows users to interact directly with the following services from their IDE: API Gateway CloudFormation Cloudwatch Logs ECR ECS IoT Lambda S3 Step Functions Systems Manager Although it is possible to interact with these services via the AWS API, the extension does provide a nice UI.
